variable.name: shareid
variable.description: Unique study participant identification number

variable.name: IDTYPE
variable.description: Framingham Heart Study cohort identifier

variable.name: ADPTYPE
variable.description: ADP threshold type
variable.comment: For ADPTYPE: < stands for "less than or equal to" = stands for "exact" > stands for "greater than" ADPTYPE and ADP_THRESHOLD need to be used together to get a correct value for ADP threshold.

variable.name: EPITYPE
variable.description: EPI threshold type
variable.comment: For EPITYPE: < stands for "less than or equal to" = stands for "exact" > stands for "greater than" EPITYPE and EPI_THRESHOLD need to be used together to get a correct value for EPI threshold. Blank = Field not filled in. Non-blank = Field filled in.

variable.name: COLLAGEN
variable.description: Collagen lag time

variable.name: ARACHIDO
variable.description: Arachidonic acid caused aggregation

variable.name: FIBRIN
variable.description: Fibrinogen

variable.name: TPA
variable.description: Tissue plasminogen activator

variable.name: PAI
variable.description: Plasminogen activator inhibitor 1

variable.name: FACTOR7
variable.description: Factor VII

variable.name: vwf
variable.description: Von Willebrand factor

variable.name: VISC_PC
variable.description: Viscosity percent

variable.name: VISC_CPS
variable.description: Viscosity centipoise

variable.name: VISC_SS
variable.description: Viscosity shear stress

variable.name: EDATE
variable.description: Blood draw date
variable.comment: Date includes month, day and year, however, coding manual displays only month and year to preserve confidentiality. Number of days since Exam 1.

variable.name: PRPPC
variable.description: Platelet count on platelet-rich plasma

variable.name: aspirin
variable.description: Aspirin effect - based on arachidonic acid and review of aggregation curves

variable.name: ADP_THRESHOLD
variable.description: ADP threshold
variable.comment: ADP_THRESHOLD refers to the lowest concentration of ADP that produced a 50% aggregation in 4 minutes. ADPTYPE and ADP_THRESHOLD need to be used together to get a correct value for ADP threshold.

variable.name: EPI_THRESHOLD
variable.description: EPI threshold
variable.comment: EPI_THRESHOLD refers to the lowest concentration of EPI that produced a 50% aggregation in 5 minutes. EPITYPE and EPI_THRESHOLD need to be used together to get a correct value for EPI threshold.

variable.name: amax_agg1
variable.description: ADP maximum aggregation observed at ACONC1

variable.description: ADP maximum aggregation observed at ACONC2

variable.description: ADP maximum aggregation observed at ACONC8
